about_department:
The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is highly esteemed for its exceptional standards in computer engineering education.

NBA accredited and renowned for producing top-tier professionals and making a substantial impact in the software industry both domestically and internationally, NIET stands out as a frontrunner in this domain. The department is dedicated to cutting-edge research and providing state-of-the-art education.
research_text:
Research
Our research activity is the heartbeat of innovation and excellence.

With 71 publications in prestigious SCI/SCOPUS Journals, we're at the forefront of groundbreaking discoveries and knowledge dissemination. Our relentless pursuit of knowledge extends to an ongoing project collaboration with IIT Roorkee, where we're pushing the boundaries of technology and science

71

Publications
our_mentors:
The Institute is Accredited by
NAAC (A Grade, 3.23)

NBA Accredited
infrastructure:
2700+

Placements

Our Placement
Step out to win

Successful Placements are at the heart of what NIET, Greator Noida delivers. This year we have achieved 2700+ Placements with the average package of 6.00 LPA, Highest National Placement with 51.00 LPA and International Placement achieved for MBA Student at Dubai
entrepreneurial_desc:
Entrepreneurial Cell

A non-profit organisation run by students of NIET Gr.Noida. to create awareness among the students about Entrepreneurship through various programs like workshops, speaker session and other such events.

about_department:
The Department of Computer Science & Engineering (CSE) was established in the year 1985. Over the years, the department has developed to become a center of excellence, providing in-depth technical knowledge and opportunities for innovation and research.

The department has tie-ups with various industries and offers courses in collaboration with them. The department has a strong research interest in diverse areas of Computer Science and offers a Ph.D. Program.

about_department:
In today's dynamic world, the Information Technology sector is a realm of boundless diversity and exponential growth.

IT professionals are explorers of knowledge, often navigating between different professional specializations as their interests evolve and their expertise expands. With an IT degree tailored to the real-world, you'll embark on a captivating odyssey through a myriad of career options. You can delve into the art of software development, immerse yourself in the intricate world of computer programming, analyse businesses with precision as a business analyst, craft data models that reveal hidden insights, master the intricate dance of systems integration, and even orchestrate the symphony of network management.

about_department:
The B.Tech in Computer Science department with a specialization in cloud computing is a four-year undergraduate program that provides students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed in the cloud computing industry.

The cloud computing industry is growing rapidly, and there is a high demand for skilled professionals. With a B.Tech in Cloud Computing, you will be well-positioned to pursue a successful career in this exciting and growing field.

about_department:
NIET, in collaboration with India's foremost IT Service and Consulting Company, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), is proud to introduce a cutting-edge four-year specialized B.Tech program known as "Computer Science and Business Systems" (CSBS).

This program has been meticulously designed to meet the burgeoning demand for engineering professionals equipped with both technological expertise and a strong foundation in business acumen.

about_department:
At NIET, a four-year under-graduate B.Tech program in Data Science has been specifically designed to provide a platform to undergraduate students for a prospective career in upcoming data science industry.

The course encompasses Data Science as an interdisciplinary, problem-solving approach that learns to apply scientific techniques to practical problems. It is an intensive skill-oriented program with enough practical training for building business models for analytics.

department_name: Computer Science and Engineering (Internet of Things)
about_department:
The Internet of Things (IoT) is an interdisciplinary program that has its application enormously increased in the past few years since it has a vast scope of usage.

IoT generally refers to a growing network of internet-connected devices that find various applications in engineering and sciences. When objects are interconnected across the world, it allows people or things using those objects to be connected anytime.

about_department:
Mechanical Engineering is a very broad field, including disciplines such as advanced manufacturing technology, machine design, fluid dynamics, and thermodynamics.

It is possible to spend an entire career focused on just one of the disciplines mentioned. Because of this, it is typical for different mechanical engineers to have entirely different skill sets. The breadth of the field also allows mechanical engineers much flexibility in deciding what it is that they want to focus on.

The Department of Biotechnology (DBT), NBA-accredited, was established in the year 2012 with an undergraduate program. Over the years, the department has seen exponential growth and has cemented its credentials both in the field of teaching and research.

Our vision has been to impart quality education to the budding biotechnology professionals and also foster strong interdisciplinary research in frontier areas of Biotechnology. The Biotechnology department has signed MOUs with Codon Biotech. Pvt. Ltd.

about_department:
It is our immense pleasure to welcome you to our MCA Department. The Master of Computer Application course is formed in the year 2001, is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow.

The M.C.A. Department helps in providing the I.T. and Computer Industry with world-class talent and creating some of the finest software professionals every year. By providing concept-oriented subject knowledge through a high-quality teaching supplemented with practical training, the Department aims to bring out the brightest minds into the world of computers and technology.

about_department:
Business is about managing technological change, markets, corporate cultures, and global environments.

NIET's management candidates face the rigors of a business education that focuses on combining classical business skills, such as finance and strategic planning, with creativity and sound judgment. Postgraduates from NIET are highly desirable job candidates because they are self-directed, ethical, and effective contributors to their communities. The department of Master of Business Administration (MBA) was established in the year 2004, with an intake of 60.
